text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1939 Final was the 37th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Montjuïc in Barcelona, on 25 June 1939, being won by Sevilla FC, who beat Racing Club de Ferrol 6-2. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Sevilla FC: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Manuel Bueno |- |DF ||2|| José Cayuso |- |DF ||3|| Diego Villalonga |- |MF ||4|| Miguel Torrontegui |- |MF ||5|| Félix |- |MF ||6|| Leoncito |- |FW ||7|| Pepe López |- |FW ||8|| Pepillo |- |FW ||9|| Campanal (c) |- |FW||10|| Raimundo |- |FW||11|| Rafael Berrocal |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Pepe Brand |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Racing Club de Ferrol: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Jyula Kiszel |- |DF ||2|| Caliche |- |DF ||3|| Moreno (c) |- |MF ||4|| Inocencio Bertolí |- |MF ||5|| José Silvosa |- |MF ||6|| Pedro Basterrechea |- |FW ||7|| Lelé |- |FW ||8|| Ricardo Gallart |- |FW ||9|| Paco Barón |- |FW||10|| Edelmiro |- |FW||11|| Portugués |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| José Planas Sotés |- |} |} ==References== 1939 Copa Category:Sevilla FC matches
title: 1939 Copa del Generalísimo Final
